Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad clue collection by observing general architectural features and forming wide regional hypotheses.

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifying specific clues to converge on a precise location hypothesis.
Conclusive identification of the specific establishment through detailed signage and quick location confirmation.
In-depth verification using online tools to confirm exact address and the bar’s name.
Further refinement of geographic coordinates and preparation of the final summary.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad exploratory clue collection to focused verification of a specific Brussels location hypothesis.
